law.catch_line: Court may quash execution improperly issued.
law.text: The court may, after reasonable notice, quash an execution on the ground that the representative or successor of a deceased plaintiff is not properly stated in the indorsement on the execution.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 433, effective January 2, 1978. -- Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 406.
